item.title: Hackers Tap Into Microsoft Sharepoint Software
item.description: Microsoft SharePoint’s hack creates risk for thousands of organizations as the tech giant rushes to create a patch. Bloomberg’s Brody Ford discusses the latest developments with Caroline Hyde on “Bloo
